conditions.short_description: The snow pack is getting stronger after warm weather but wet sluffs could release. Still chances of wind slabs at high elevations in the Westfjords.
conditions.full_description: The snow pack is getting stronger after warm weather but wet sluffs could release. Still chances of wind slabs at high elevations in the Westfjords.

area_forecast.forecast: The snow pack is likely getting stronger after thaw.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: An avalanche released in Kjósarskarð on Okt 29.
area_forecast.snow_condition: It has rained onto the snow and in some places frosen again. The snow pack is most likely getting stronger, but some layering could still be present, especially in gullies.
area_forecast.weather: NA/A-átt næstu daga og úrkomulítið. Hiti yfirleitt yfir frostmarki til fjalla en sums staðar næturfrost.

area_forecast.forecast: Snow cover is different between fjords. Possible windslabs in southerly aspects. Warm temperatures and rain in lowlands but snowfall possible in highest mountains. Snow can be unstable for a while as it becomes wet.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: A small avalanche fell above Flateyri, detected by the radar, on 31st october.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Snow cover is different between fjords, more snow in the NV-part. Possible windslabs in southerly aspects and snow becomes wet during the weekend. A small avalanche fell by Flateyri on the 31st. october, indicating a weak layer in the snow, affected by the mild temperatures. Snow melts and subsides and becomes more stable as it cools again on Monday.
area_forecast.weather: Viðvarandi NA-átt næstu daga og hlýtt í veðri. Skúrir en él til fjalla um tíma. Styttir upp en áfram hvasst og kólnar á mánudag.

area_forecast.forecast: Considerable snow in mountains and windslabs have accumulated in W- and S- aspects, layering possible. Wet snow could be unstable for a time, first in lower elevations and later higher up on Saturday.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: A small dry loose avalanche fell in Hrafnaskál in Ólafsfjörðru on Tuesday 28th Oktober. On the 29th October and avalanche fell by the Siglufjörður road and 3 avalanches fell on the 30th above road Ólafsfjaraðrvegur, none of the reaching the road.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Considerable snow is in the area, mostly it has snowed in northerly and northeast wind and have windslabs formed, especially in S- and W- aspects. Some layering could be expected between windslabs. Wet snow in lower elevations in thaw, but with increasing elevation of freezing level the snow hight up could become unstable and wet later in the weekend. Snow will become more stable on Monday with cooling weather.
area_forecast.weather: Norðaustlæg eða breytileg átt, hlýtt í veðri og ringing eða skúrir en fer kólnadni og styttir upp á mánudag.

area_forecast.forecast: The snow pack is getting stronger after rain.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Considerable precipitaion on Friday, rain at lower elevations but sleet in the mountains and snow at the highest peaks. Wind slabs could have formed at very high elevations, but it will rain on Saturday at high elevations. The snow pack is generally considered stable after the rain, and will become even stronger when it freezes.
area_forecast.weather: NA/A-átt og hlýtt á laugardag með dálítilli rigningu. Kólnar aftur á sunnudag og mánudag og frystir til fjalla en úrkomulítið.

weather_forecast.forecast: Warm on Saturday and intermittent rain. Becoming a bit colder on Sunday with some precipitation in the north and west. Looks like rain in the SE and E parts on Monday.
